TopicTitle: Corrupted persistent.sfs file - can't load saved game

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm running KSP v1.04 32-bit on Windows 8.1 64-bit OS.

I have a few dozen mods installed.

Everything was going fine (well, except for out of memory crashes every few hours, but that's not the issue I'm here to discuss). I had just finished a four-hour mission to Eve and Gilly. Saved, went back to mission control, and quit the game.

Then I reloaded KSP, I click the "Resume Saved Game" option in the menu but nothing happens; it just highlights the text as if it had been clicked on, but the menu that displays the list of saved games doesn't display.

This happens with both saved games I have, not just the main one that I was playing with.

I can create a new game just fine, I just can't load anything.

There is nothing in the logs. In fact, the logs themselves aren't even generated for some reason. (There is literally no output_log.txt to speak of!)

I had the S.A.V.E. mod installed. Thankfully, that backed up my saved games folder. The most recent backup was from two days ago and that runs fine. But, you know, I'd rather not lose the last two days worth of gameplay.

Does anyone have any suggestions on how to fix this? I have attached my SFS files.

Hopefully someone has some idea. I realise it's difficult to help without a log file...

Thanks in advance.

Dave

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/4446393/persistent.sfs

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/4446393/quicksave.sfs
